attributes.action: Stop a undemocratic second referendum , the choice has been made by a referendum
attributes.additional_details: So if we don’t agree with any result of referendum or elections are we just going to repeat them until we are happy
attributes.background: We have had a referendum , the majority chose leave , it did not ask with or without a deal we voted in or out , out was what the majority chose , ministers that don’t agree can’t keep trying till remain wins ,
